Software Engineering, Wuhan University Research Interests Cyber-Physical System Security Side Channel Analysis Sensing and Automation Security Embedded Systems Privacy In The News Assistant professor in CSSE exposes vulnerability in AI-powered security cameras, offers new defenses in development Yazhou Tuâs research emphasized that artificial intelligence systems such as smart doorbells with security cameras, while marketed as enhancements, don't automatically address all vulnerabilities and might even create new risks.
